mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, a.auction_id AS auctionId, a.auction_title AS productName, (SELECT ai.auction_image_url FROM auction_images ai WHERE ai.auction_id = a.auction_id LIMIT 1) AS imageUrl, a.auction_end_time AS auctionEndTime, o.order_amount AS finalPrice, o.order_status::text AS paymentStatus, o.order_payment_deadline AS paymentDueDate FROM orders o JOIN auctions a ON o.auction_id = a.auction_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.order_created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
